#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
int arr[20+1][20+1];
int n;
int maze(int x,int y,char c)
{
    if(x==n&&y==n)return 1;
    int t=0;
    arr[x][y]=1;
    if(arr[x+1][y]==0)t+= maze(x+1,y,'d');
    if(arr[x-1][y]==0)t+= maze(x-1,y,'u');
    if(arr[x][y+1]==0)t+= maze(x,y+1,'r');
    if(arr[x][y-1]==0)t+= maze(x,y-1,'l');
    arr[x][y]=0;
    return t;
}
int main()
{
    for(int i=0;i<=20;i++)
    {
        for(int j=0;j<=20;++j)arr[i][j]=1;
    }
    cin>>n;
    for(int i=1;i<=n;i++)
    {
        for(int j=1;j<=n;++j)scanf("%d",&arr[i][j]);
    }
    printf("%d",maze(1,1,'k'));
}
